query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM municipalities) as municipalities_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projects) as projects_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assets) as assets_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assessments) as assessments_count;
